original_text: You drank on my special hill. 1: In verses 16-18, God is speaking to the people of Edom. In the same way, people from all countries will drink and they will not stop. They will drink until God has killed them. 1: The people from Edom had drunk alcohol in God's holy place. It was where the Israelites prayed to God, in Jerusalem city. God is saying that he will punish them. It will be like when people drink poison. It will be like a drink that contains God's anger. But they will not be able to stop drinking. They will drink until God's anger has killed them all. You drank on my special hill. 1: In verses 16-18, God is speaking to the people of Edom. In the same way, people from all countries will drink and they will not stop. They will drink until God has killed them. 1: The people from Edom had drunk alcohol in God's holy place. It was where the Israelites prayed to God, in Jerusalem city. God is saying that he will punish them. It will be like when people drink poison. It will be like a drink that contains God's anger. But they will not be able to stop drinking. They will drink until God's anger has killed them all. You drank on my special hill.
korean_text: 너희가 내 성산에서 마신 것 같이 만국인이 항상 마시리니 곧 마시고 삼켜서 본래 없던 것 같이 되리라

sentences.original_text: You drank on my special hill.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나의 특별한 언덕에서 마셨다.

sentences.original_text: In verses 16-18, God is speaking
sentences.korean_translation: 16-18절에서 하나님은 말씀하고 계신다

sentences.original_text: to the people of Edom.
sentences.korean_translation: 에돔 사람들에게.

sentences.original_text: In the same way, people from all countries will drink
sentences.korean_translation: 같은 방식으로, 모든 나라 사람들이 마실 것이다

sentences.original_text: and they will not stop.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 멈추지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will drink until God has killed them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님이 그들을 죽일 때까지 마실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: The people from Edom had drunk alcohol
sentences.korean_translation: 에돔 사람들은 술을 마셨었다

sentences.original_text: in God's holy place.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 거룩한 곳에서.

sentences.original_text: It was where the Israelites prayed to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 이스라엘 사람들이 하나님께 기도하던 곳이었다

sentences.original_text: in Jerusalem city.
sentences.korean_translation: 예루살렘 도시에서.

sentences.original_text: God is saying that he will punish them.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그들을 벌하실 것이라고 말씀하고 계신다.

sentences.original_text: It will be like when people drink poison.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 사람들이 독을 마실 때와 같을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: It will be like a drink that contains God's anger.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님의 분노가 담긴 음료와 같을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: But they will not be able to stop drinking.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 마시는 것을 멈출 수 없을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will drink until God's anger has killed them all.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님의 분노가 그들을 모두 죽일 때까지 마실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: You drank on my special hill.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나의 특별한 언덕에서 마셨다.

sentences.original_text: In verses 16-18, God is speaking
sentences.korean_translation: 16-18절에서 하나님은 말씀하고 계신다

sentences.original_text: to the people of Edom.
sentences.korean_translation: 에돔 사람들에게.

sentences.original_text: In the same way, people from all countries will drink
sentences.korean_translation: 같은 방식으로, 모든 나라 사람들이 마실 것이다

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 멈추지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will drink until God has killed them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님이 그들을 죽일 때까지 마실 것이다.

sentences.korean_translation: 에돔 사람들은 술을 마셨었다

sentences.original_text: in God's holy place.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 거룩한 곳에서.

sentences.original_text: It was where the Israelites prayed to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 이스라엘 사람들이 하나님께 기도하던 곳이었다

sentences.original_text: in Jerusalem city.
sentences.korean_translation: 예루살렘 도시에서.

sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그들을 벌하실 것이라고 말씀하고 계신다.

sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님의 분노가 담긴 음료와 같을 것이다.

sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 마시는 것을 멈출 수 없을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will drink until God's anger has killed them all.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님의 분노가 그들을 모두 죽일 때까지 마실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: You drank on my special hill.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나의 특별한 언덕에서 마셨다.
